title: New: Saint Savanna – A Real Hero (College Cover)
body:
So covering moments from the Drive soundtrack is the new remixing Lana Del Rey; everyone is doing it, but hey, if you think you can do it half as well as Brighton’s **Saint Savanna**, then by all means, go for it.

So it’s not a million miles from the original, and it helps that it’s a bloody fantastic piece of songwriting, yet there’s something adorably cutesy to this take on College’s _A Real Hero_. Check it out below.
